text: Prospect United F.C. was an English association football club based in Hoyland, Barnsley, South Yorkshire. ==History== The club was formed after the end of the First World War, and played in the Barnsley Association League (winning the title twice) and the FA Cup.Green Un, 13 September 1919, page 3Green Un, 28 October 1922, page 5 ==Honours== *Barnsley Association League **Champions - 1920/21, 1924/25 ==Records== *Best FA Cup performance: 1st Qualifying Round, three occasions ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire
title: Prospect United F.C.
